description: Creates an OpenSearch UI application. For more information, see Using the OpenSearch user interface in Amazon OpenSearch Service.

parameters.name: clientToken
parameters.description: Unique, case-sensitive identifier to ensure idempotency of the request. This field is autopopulated if not provided.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The unique name of the OpenSearch application. Names must be unique within an Amazon Web Services Region for each account.

parameters.name: dataSources
parameters.description: The data sources to link to the OpenSearch application. (dict) --- Data sources that are associated with an OpenSearch Application. dataSourceArn (string) --- The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the domain. See Identifiers for IAM Entities in Using Amazon Web Services Identity and Access Management for more information. dataSourceDescription (string) --- Detailed description of a data source.

nested_params.name: dataSourceArn
nested_params.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the domain. See Identifiers for IAM Entities in Using Amazon Web Services Identity and Access Management for more information.

nested_params.name: dataSourceDescription
nested_params.description: Detailed description of a data source.

parameters.name: iamIdentityCenterOptions
parameters.description: Configuration settings for integrating Amazon Web Services IAM Identity Center with the OpenSearch application. enabled (boolean) --- Specifies whether IAM Identity Center is enabled or disabled. iamIdentityCenterInstanceArn (string) --- The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the domain. See Identifiers for IAM Entities in Using Amazon Web Services Identity and Access Management for more information. iamRoleForIdentityCenterApplicationArn (string) --- The ARN of the IAM role associated with the IAM Identity Center application.

nested_params.name: enabled
nested_params.description: Specifies whether IAM Identity Center is enabled or disabled.

nested_params.name: iamIdentityCenterInstanceArn
nested_params.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the domain. See Identifiers for IAM Entities in Using Amazon Web Services Identity and Access Management for more information.

nested_params.name: iamRoleForIdentityCenterApplicationArn
nested_params.description: The ARN of the IAM role associated with the IAM Identity Center application.

parameters.name: appConfigs
parameters.description: Configuration settings for the OpenSearch application, including administrative options. (dict) --- Configuration settings for an OpenSearch application. For more information, see see Using the OpenSearch user interface in Amazon OpenSearch Service. key (string) --- The configuration item to set, such as the admin role for the OpenSearch application. value (string) --- The value assigned to the configuration key, such as an IAM user ARN.

nested_params.name: key
nested_params.description: The configuration item to set, such as the admin role for the OpenSearch application.

nested_params.name: value
nested_params.description: The value assigned to the configuration key, such as an IAM user ARN.

parameters.name: tagList
parameters.description: A list of tags attached to a domain. (dict) --- A tag (key-value pair) for an Amazon OpenSearch Service resource. The tag key. Tag keys must be unique for the domain to which they are attached. The value assigned to the corresponding tag key. Tag values can be null and don't have to be unique in a tag set. For example, you can have a key value pair in a tag set of project : Trinity and cost-center : Trinity.

nested_params.name: Key
nested_params.description: The tag key. Tag keys must be unique for the domain to which they are attached.

nested_params.name: Value
nested_params.description: The value assigned to the corresponding tag key. Tag values can be null and don't have to be unique in a tag set. For example, you can have a key value pair in a tag set of project : Trinity and cost-center : Trinity.

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: The unique identifier assigned to the OpenSearch application.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the OpenSearch application.

nested_items.name: arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the domain. See Identifiers for IAM Entities in Using Amazon Web Services Identity and Access Management for more information.

nested_items.name: dataSources
nested_items.description: The data sources linked to the OpenSearch application.

nested_items.name: dataSourceArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the domain. See Identifiers for IAM Entities in Using Amazon Web Services Identity and Access Management for more information.

nested_items.name: dataSourceDescription
nested_items.description: Detailed description of a data source.

nested_items.name: iamIdentityCenterOptions
nested_items.description: The IAM Identity Center settings configured for the OpenSearch application.

nested_items.name: enabled
nested_items.description: Indicates whether IAM Identity Center is enabled for the OpenSearch Application.

nested_items.name: iamIdentityCenterInstanceArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the domain. See Identifiers for IAM Entities in Using Amazon Web Services Identity and Access Management for more information.

nested_items.name: iamRoleForIdentityCenterApplicationArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the IAM role assigned to the IAM Identity Center application for the OpenSearch Application.

nested_items.name: iamIdentityCenterApplicationArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the domain. See Identifiers for IAM Entities in Using Amazon Web Services Identity and Access Management for more information.

nested_items.name: appConfigs
nested_items.description: Configuration settings for the OpenSearch application, including administrative options.

nested_items.name: key
nested_items.description: The configuration item to set, such as the admin role for the OpenSearch application.

nested_items.name: value
nested_items.description: The value assigned to the configuration key, such as an IAM user ARN.

nested_items.name: tagList
nested_items.description: A list of tags attached to a domain.

nested_items.name: Key
nested_items.description: The tag key. Tag keys must be unique for the domain to which they are attached.

nested_items.name: Value
nested_items.description: The value assigned to the corresponding tag key. Tag values can be null and don't have to be unique in a tag set. For example, you can have a key value pair in a tag set of project : Trinity and cost-center : Trinity.

nested_items.name: createdAt
nested_items.description: The timestamp indicating when the OpenSearch application was created.
